mapper.sql: id, state, sc_remark, group_name, sc_value, sc_type, sc_key, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into sys_config (id, state, sc_remark, group_name, sc_value, sc_type, sc_key, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_config
id,
state,
sc_remark,
group_name,
sc_value,
sc_type,
sc_key,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update sys_config
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sc_remark = #{scRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sc_value = #{scValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sc_type = #{scType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sc_key = #{scKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_config set state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sc_remark = #{scRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sc_value = #{scValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sc_type = #{scType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sc_key = #{scKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_config WHERE group_name = "车辆品牌" AND state =0

SELECT
FROM sys_config WHERE group_name = #{carBrand} AND state =0
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM sys_config WHERE sc_value = #{scValue}

SELECT
FROM sys_config WHERE group_name = #{group} AND state =0

SELECT
FROM sys_config WHERE group_name = #{carBrand} AND sc_value = #{brand} AND sc_type = 1

SELECT
FROM sys_config WHERE group_name = #{groupName} and state = #{state}
select count(0) from sys_config where group_name = #{groupName}
